caption.title: Vulnerability of Rice and Coffee (Robusta) to climate change (2050) under a high emission scenario (RCP 8.5).
caption.p: The vulnerability of rice and coffee (Robusta) are a function of sensitivity, exposure and adaptive capacity. The vulnerability index is categorized into five classes from ‘lowest’ to ‘highest’ using the equal intervals classification in ArcMap 10.1.
Click here for additional data file.
